alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued November 17 at 2:25PM CST until November 18 at 8:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Southwest Mississippi and adjacent Louisiana Parishes as well as the Pearl River drainage areas. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana
